title: Solo Crudo
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Fusion, All Raw
description: Opened Jun 2015, this is a 100% raw vegan street food place that offers dishes prepared with local organic produce. Has juices and smoothies. Primarily set up for take away and delivery, but has a few stools to eat in. Sample dishes such as zucchini and avocado in tartar sauce, spinach and pistachio nuts in velvet sauce, carrot and ginger soup, ayurvedic salad in spicy mango sauce. Eco-friendly.
